item.title: How to get the uploaded file path and processing its file in Streamlit
item.description: Motivation Streamlit is a powerful tools to quickliy build the demo application. If we use Streamlit file upload feature via WebBrowser then we need to its file path to process the uploaded file. So I will introduce how to get uploaed file path in Streamlit. Example We buid the PDF File upload feature in Streamlit and its PDF file convert to image. We use Belval/pdf2image which is a populer PDF converting tool.
